MICRO
	c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100001100000011001111010111 //Sw+0->PC,MAR
m01 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LDA $K,X
m02 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m03 0000000000010100000101100000001111011101 //MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m04 0000000000011100001100000001001110011101 //MDR+0->ACC
m05 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m06 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c LDX #K
m07 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m08 0000000000011100001100000110001110011101 //MDR+0->Î§
m09 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0a 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c INX
m0b 0000000000010100001101100110011110011110 //X+1->X
m0c 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c CMPX #Y
m0e 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m0f 0000000000010100100101100000001110111101 //X-MDR->NOP,FLAGS
m10 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m11 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c STA $K,X
m12 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m13 0000000000010100000101100000001111011101 //MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m14 0000000000010000000100010000001100011111 //ACC+0->NOP,MWE
m15 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m16 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c ADC $K,X
m17 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m18 0000000000010100000101100000001111011101 //MDR+X->NOP,MAR
m19 0000000000010100001100010001001110011001 //MDR+ACC->ACC(CARRY)
m1a 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m1b 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c CRC
m1c 0000000000011100000100000000001110111110 //0+0->NOP,MSTATUS=1
m1d 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m1e 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c BRNZ $K
m1f 0010001101110100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR,[BRA,BIN,CON]
m20 0000000000011100001100000011001110011101 //MDR+0->PC
m21 0000000000010000000100110000001111011111 //PC+0->NOP,MAR
m22 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
m23 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m24 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c SHLA
m25 0000000000010000011100010001000110111111 //ACC+0->ACC,SH~=0
m26 0000000000010100001100110011011111011110 //PC+1->PC,MAR
m27 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
	c HALT
m28 0000000000010000001100110011001111011111 //PC+0->PC,MAR
m29 0000000000000000000100000000001110001111 //NEXT(PC)
MAPPER
m00 02 LDA $K,X
m01 07 LDX #K
m02 0b INX
m03 0e CMPX #Y
m04 12 STA $K,X
m05 17 ADC $K,X
m06 1c CRC
m07 1f BRNZ $K
m08 25 SHLA
m09 28 HALT
MAIN
m00 00
m01 10
m02 08
m03 05
m04 20
m05 04
m06 30
m07 02
m08 03
m09 08
m0a 07
m0b 00
m0c 06
m0d 09
